pageContext.title: Trout propels Angels past Sabathia, Yanks
pageContext.content:
Mike Trout hit a home run and made several strong plays in center field as the Angels dropped Yankees starter CC Sabathia to 3-8 on the season.

ANAHEIM, Calif. — Mike Trout and C.J. Cron homered, Albert Pujols and Kole Calhoun added run-scoring doubles, and the Los Angeles Angels beat the
